did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Digital Libraries and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Journal of an unidentified slave overseer listing slave names and amount of crops each picked. Also lists when and which slaves were sick each day, money obtained for a crop, home remedies for common illnesses, and the journey itinerary for a cargo ship.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Overseer's Journal, Ms1994-010, Special Collections, University Libraries, Virginia Polytechnic Institute & State University.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: This journal was maintained from 1853-1861 by an unidentified slave overseer - possibly Erastus Bishop of Petersburg, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The journal lists slave names and amount of crops (including cotton, peas, corn) each picked. It also lists when and which slaves were sick each day, how much money was obtained for a crop, home remedies for common illnesses, and the journey itinerary for a cargo ship.
